description:
WIth a lightweight texture, 4-way stretch mobility to keep you moving, and moisture-wicking properties to keep you cool and confident, our Propsect Heights Crew packs a powerful punch in a simple, everyday workout style.

Because it’s bluesign®-approved, you can feel good knowing that harmful chemicals were kept out of our waters and skies while this style was made. Plus, it’s made with recycled polyester and REFIBRA™ upcycled fabric. Talk about sustainable strength.
name: Prana Prospect Heights Crew - Mens
